Recipe.Title: Slow Cooker Pot Roast
Recipe.RecipeIntroduction: This is a very easy recipe for a delicious pot roast. It makes its own gravy. It's designed especially for the working person who does not have time to cook all day, but it tastes like you did. You'll want the cut to be between 5 and 6 pounds.

RecipeStep.StepText: In a slow cooker, mix 2 10.75 ounce cans cream of mushroom soup, 1 ounce of dry onion soup mix, and 1 1/4 cups water. Place the 5 1/2 pound pot roast in slow cooker and coat with soup mixture.
RecipeStep.Title: Put Roast in Slow Cooker

RecipeStep.StepText: Cook on High setting for 3 to 4 hours, or on Low setting for 8 to 9 hours.
RecipeStep.Title: Cook Roast
